product_name: Nite Ize Cargo Trail Clip Case
long_description: The Nite Ize Cargo Trail Clip Case keeps your compact PDA or cell phone protected and close at hand. Built from a tough nylon material that resists abrasion for lasting service. Stretch nylon side panels expand to accommodate various thicknesses of cell phones or other electronic devices. Strong, wide plastic clip secures to belts or webbing up to 2 in. wide. Secondary internal stretch-nylon pocket secures cards or other small items. Rip-and-stick flap closure secures phone or other items inside case to prevent loss during activity. Dimension in Specs tab are for Medium; dimensions for Small are 4 x 2 x 1 in.
short_description: The Nite Ize Cargo Trail Clip Case keeps your compact PDA or cell phone protected and close at hand.
